mapper.select: select * from post where tag != 'A' order by num desc limit #{startIndex}, 7
select count(*) as count from post where tag != 'A'
select * from post where (tag = 'A' and pnum=#{pnum})
mapper.insert: INSERT into post (tag, w_id, w_nickname, title, content) values(#{tag}, #{w_id},#{w_nickname}, #{title}, #{content})

insert into post_photo(w_id, w_nickname, title, content, p1, p2, p3, p4, p5, desc1, desc2, desc3, desc4, desc5) values(#{w_id},#{w_nickname}, #{title}, #{content}, #{p1},#{p2}, #{p3}, #{p4}, #{p5}, #{desc1},#{desc2}, #{desc3}, #{desc4}, #{desc5})
